nav.exportAssurance: All products available for bulk & export orders

hero.title: Export-Ready Nightwear & Kidswear
hero.supportLine: Premium wholesale production for global markets
hero.subtitle: Export-ready designs with consistent quality, scalable production, and global supply capability. Trusted by wholesalers and export buyers across international markets.

exportReady.title: Export-Ready Manufacturer
exportReady.description: State-of-the-art production facility in Tiruppur, India

bulkCustom.title: Bulk & Custom Orders
bulkCustom.description: Flexible MOQ with complete customization options

qualityControlled.title: Quality-Controlled Production
qualityControlled.description: Multi-stage quality checks at every production phase

ethicalManufacturing.title: Ethical Manufacturing
ethicalManufacturing.description: Sustainable practices with fair labor standards

womensSection.title: Women's Nightwear —
womensSection.description: Designed for comfort, repeat sales, and global appeal. Our women's night pants and tops are crafted using export-grade cotton with consistent sizing, rich color retention, and high demand across domestic and international markets.

highlights.ideal: Ideal for retail chains & export buyers

kidsSection.title: Kidswear That
kidsSection.description: Bright colors, soft fabrics, and designs kids love. Our kidswear collections are built for high turnover retail and export markets, offering comfort, durability, and visual appeal.

exportCategories.title: Export-Ready Core Garment Categories
exportCategories.description: High-volume, consistent-quality apparel manufactured in India for global markets.

cottonTshirts.title: Cotton T-Shirts
cottonTshirts.description: High-demand cotton T-shirts designed for bulk export and wholesale supply. Manufactured with consistent sizing, smooth finishes, and long-lasting fabric quality suitable for international retail markets.

pyjamasCasual.title: Pyjamas & Casual Wear
pyjamasCasual.description: Comfortable, climate-friendly pyjamas and casual wear collections developed for strong repeat demand in domestic and international markets.

innerwearBasics.title: Innerwear & Basics
innerwearBasics.description: Essential innerwear and basic garments manufactured with quality consistency, durability, and comfort, suitable for bulk wholesale and export markets.

exportCategories.trustNote: All categories manufactured in our Tiruppur facility with consistent quality control for international export standards.

whyChoose.title: Why Exporters & Wholesale Buyers
whyChoose.description: Built for scale, designed for trust. We understand what wholesale and export partners need.

qualityControl.title: Export-Ready Quality Control
qualityControl.description: Multi-stage quality checks meeting international standards

bulkProduction.title: Consistent Bulk Production
bulkProduction.description: Reliable capacity for large-scale orders with uniform quality

moqFlexibility.title: MOQ Flexibility
moqFlexibility.description: Flexible minimum order quantities for new partnerships

dashboard.title: Private Wholesale Dashboard
dashboard.description: Exclusive access to catalogs, pricing, and order tracking

exportSupport.title: Pan-India & Export Support
exportSupport.description: Seamless logistics for domestic and international shipping

pricing.title: Transparent Pricing Model
pricing.description: Clear wholesale pricing with no hidden costs

confidence.title: Feather
confidence.description: Designed to reduce dead stock risk for wholesale & export partners

fastMovers.title: FAST MOVERS ONLY
fastMovers.description: We focus on proven, high-demand styles that sell quickly across markets

flexibility.title: SIZE & COLOR FLEXIBILITY
flexibility.description: Customize size ratios and color assortments to match your market needs

fairPolicy.title: FAIR ADJUSTMENT POLICY
fairPolicy.description: Transparent policies for quality issues and order adjustments

confidence.termsNote: * Terms & conditions apply. Contact us for detailed partnership terms.

trustScale.title: Trusted by Retailers &
trustScale.description: Our track record speaks for itself. Join hundreds of successful wholesale partnerships.

productCategories.title: Product Categories
productCategories.description: Premium knitwear and activewear manufactured to international standards. Customization available for all categories.

manufacturing.title: Manufacturing Excellence from Tiruppur
manufacturing.description: Located in Tiruppur, Tamil Nadu — India's knitwear capital — we bring decades of manufacturing expertise to every order. Our vertically integrated facility ensures complete quality control from fabric to finished garment.

compliance.title: Legally Registered & Export Compliant
compliance.description: We are a government-registered export manufacturer with all necessary certifications for international trade.

ctaSection.title: Partner With Us for Your Next Order
ctaSection.description: Whether you're a buying house, importer, or brand looking for reliable manufacturing, we're ready to discuss your requirements.
ctaSection.location: Tiruppur, Tamil Nadu, India — The Knitwear Capital

footer.brandDescription: Export-oriented apparel manufacturer from Tiruppur, India, specializing in premium nightwear, kidswear, and casual garments. Trusted by global buyers for consistent quality, compliance, and scalable production.
footer.copyright: Feather Fashions. Export-oriented apparel manufacturer from India.

contact.title: Let's Connect
contact.subtitle: Let's create sustainable fashion together. Reach out for inquiries, bulk orders, private labeling, or eco-conscious collaborations.
contact.quickResponseDescription: Need immediate assistance? Connect with us on WhatsApp for faster responses.
contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your requirements, bulk orders, custom designs, or any questions...

common.success: Thank you for reaching out! We'll get back to you soon.
